Post.title: Git
Post._content: # Git ## git git: [git](https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_43682721/article/details/88570397) `Git bash Here` ```shell git init #git repositories git remote add origin https://github.com/XX/XX.git #gitorigin, github git pull origin master # ``` `fatal: couldn't find remote ref master`** repositories **pull ```shell git add . #warning git commit -m "" # ``` `error: pathspec 'commit' did not match any file(s) known to git` ```shell git push -u origin master #github ``` `fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/XX/': Recv failure: Connection was reset` [git:fatal: unable to access XXX: Recv failure: Connection was reset ](https://blog.csdn.net/m0_69087087/article/details/128838186) cmd ```shell git config --global --unset http.proxy git config --global --unset https.proxy ipconfig/flushdns ``` Github`master`,`main` [githubmasterThere isnt anything to compare._](https://blog.csdn.net/Zero_Wong/article/details/123882159) ```shell #1.GitHubmain 1.git --version # 2.git config --global init.defaultBranch main #git2.28.0gitmain #2. 1.git init //.git 2.git add . // 3.git commit -m "" 4.git remote add origin http://xxxxxxxxx.git //github 5.git pull --rebase origin main //readme.md 6.git push -u origin main // ``` ****`master`~ ![ ](/images/GitNote/branches-delete.png) ## 1 ****testgit(.git) **(Repository)**`.git`,**stage()**Git**master**,master**HEAD** ## 2 Git 1. Git 2. **** Git ## 3Git [git - (juejin.cn)](https://juejin.cn/post/7166426575724871693) ## 4Git [Git - Git (git-scm.com)](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v2/Git---Git-)

Post.title: Bolg
Post._content: # Bolg ## 1Hexo+GithubPage+ ### [ Hexo+GitHub - (zhihu.com)](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/60578464) ### Hexo+GithubPage Markdown Hexo HTML GitHub ### deployGithub **** ### Hexo ![img](/images/hexoConfigNote/v2-264c75c0e493ae8cc5f283567c64ff2c_720w.webp) ### _config.yml[ | Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/configuration.html) - ![image-20230526214734538](/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214734538.png) ![image-20230526214802166](/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214802166.png) ## 2Hexo ### - ```shell hexo init [folder] # folder Hexo ``` - ```shell hexo clean # (db.json) (public) ``` public ```shell hexo c ``` public ```shell hexo cl ``` - `public ` ```shell hexo generate #Hexo public hexo g hexo generate -f #, hexo clean && hexo generate ``` - `github` ```shell hexo deploy # _config.yml deploy ``` - Hexo _config.yml github ```shell hexo server # http://localhost:4000/ ``` ### **** - `layout` _config.yml `default_layout` **** Hexo `index.md` ```shell hexo new [layout] # source/_posts/title #title hexo new page --path about/me "About me" # source/about/me.md title "About me" hexo new page --path about/me # source/_posts/about/me.md title "page" ``` - source/_draftsnew-draft.md ```shell hexo new draft "new draft" hexo server --drafts # hexo publish [layout] <filename> # ``` [ | Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/commands.html) [Hexo - (jianshu.com)](https://www.jianshu.com/p/a2d298e26dcd) ## 3Hexo Theme [ - , (anzhiy.cn)](https://anzhiy.cn/) - [ (anzhiy.cn)](https://anzhiy.cn/docs/quick-start.html#-) - [anzhiyu__bilibili](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Rs4y127hu/?spm_id_from=333.788&vd_source=592e40e3e456cbca5e66df60b04bf2d3) [__bilibili](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Cv4y1n7FW/?spm_id_from=pageDriver&vd_source=592e40e3e456cbca5e66df60b04bf2d3) - anzhiyu[ (anheyu.com)](https://blog.anheyu.com/docs/) - Butterfly()[Butterfly - A Simple and Card UI Design theme for Hexo](https://butterfly.js.org/) - Butterflyanzhiyu ### <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214857770.png" alt="image-20230526214857770" style="zoom:67%;" /> Loading Animation () ```yaml # Loading Animation () preloader: enable: true # source # 1. fullpage-loading # 2. pace (progress bar) # else all source: 3 # pace theme (see https://codebyzach.github.io/pace/) pace_css_url: avatar: /img/avatar.jpg # ``` ### ![image-20230526214910920](/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214910920.png) ### _config.anzhiyu.yml - nav <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214924274.png" alt="image-20230526214924274" style="zoom:50%;" /> - Code Blocks () - search () <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214939187.png" alt="image-20230526214939187" style="zoom:80%;" /> <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526214948330.png" alt="image-20230526214948330" style="zoom:50%;" /> - Math () - Image () - ****`Favicon` - **(`avatar`)**(`avatar`)Loading Animation () - index_img - default_top_img - archive_img - tag_img - category_img - Post - Share System () - Comments System - Chat Services - Footer Settings - Analysis - Advertisement - Verification () - Beautify/Effect (/) - Background effects () - aside () - Bottom right button () - Lightbox () - Tag Plugins settings () - other ## 4clash - `clash` - [Clash for Windows (miyun.app)](https://doc.miyun.app/clash-for-windows/) ## 5typora + hexo [(90) typora + hexo__-CSDN](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_32623363/article/details/100524856) - `hexo > source`images - Typora ` > ` ``` ../../source/images/${filename} ``` <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526215016301.png" alt="image-20230526215016301" style="zoom:50%;" /> - ->-> <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230526215415503.png" alt="image-20230526215415503" style="zoom:50%;" /> - hexo `hexo new <title>` typora.md ## 6Blog ```shell hexo new <title> #Blog ``` - typora`source\_posts\<title>.md`Blog - ```shell hexo cl #public hexo g # hexo s # ``` - github ```shell hexo d ``` ## 7 **[ (anzhiy.cn)](https://anzhiy.cn/docs/)theme** - `themes\anzhiyu\layout\includes\head\analytics.pug``baidu_analytics`: ```pug if theme.baidu_analytics script. var _hmt = _hmt || []; (function() { var hm = document.createElement("script"); hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?!{theme.baidu_analytics}"; var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s); })(); ``` - Baidu Analytics 1. `if theme.baidu_analytics``baidu_analytics` 2. `script.`JavaScript 3. `var _hmt = _hmt || [];``_hmt` 4. `(function() { ... })();` 5. ` var hm = document.createElement("script");``document.createElement``<script>`script 6. `hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?!{theme.baidu_analytics}";``src``theme.baidu_analytics`VueID 7. `var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];``<script>` 8. `s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s);``<script>``s`JS **[Butterfly () -2 | Butterfly](https://butterfly.js.org/posts/ceeb73f/#)** <img src="/images/hexoConfigNote/image-20230527173207803.png" alt="image-20230527173207803" style="zoom: 67%;" /> **** ![Snipaste_2023-05-27_17-56-31](/images/hexoConfigNote/Snipaste_2023-05-27_17-56-31.png) ## 8Hexo [hexo](https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=hexo&spm=1001.2101.3001.7020)-offline-popuphexo-offline-popup [hexo](https://hexo.io/) Hexo [(90) Hexo_githubhexo_Chak Aciano-CSDN](https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_58068682/article/details/116613947) ## 9 3 [() | (anheyu.com)](https://blog.anheyu.com/docs/site-configuration3.html#-3-) - - `/_posts/` ``` categories: ```

Post.title: vitepress
Post._content: # vitepress ## - **vitepressvuepress**vitepressvitevuepresswebpackvitepress - **yarnnpm**yarnyarn ## 1 ****[VitePress - (juejin.cn)](https://juejin.cn/post/7164276166084263972#heading-15) ****[vitepress - (zhihu.com)](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/605300455) ****[Using Vue in Markdown | VitePress](https://vitepress.dev/guide/using-vue) - [(92) VuePress md_-CSDN](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_45611841/article/details/115832233) ### 1.1 docs/index.md - `VitePress` 4 `doc` `page` `home` ```markdown md --- layout: doc | page | home --- // {{ $formatter.layout }} ``` **** ```markdown --- layout: home hero: name: Cocolib text: tagline: image: src: /images/logo.png alt: logo actions: - theme: brand text: link: /guide/what-is-vitepress - theme: alt text: github link: https://github.com/vuejs/vitepress features: - icon: title: 1 details: 1 - icon: title: 2 details: 2 - icon: title: 3 details: 3 --- ``` ### 1.2 docs/.vitepress/config.js 1. ****`Nav` - `link` - `activeMatch` `nav` - `text` 2. ****`socialLinks` - `icon``discord` `facebook` `github` `instagram` `linkedin` `slack` `twitter` `youtube` `svg` - `link` 3. ****`Sidebar` - `text` `title` - `items``text` `link` - `collapsible` `Boolean` - `collapsed` `Boolean` `collapsiable` 4. **** - **** `/docs/public` `md` `![image](/images/xxx.png)` `/` `public` - **** `/docs` `/` `docs` 5. **** ```js docFooter: { prev: '', next: '' } ``` 6. ** `Github` ** ```js editLink: { pattern: 'https://github.com/vuejs/vitepress/edit/main/docs/:path', text: 'Edit this page on GitHub' } ``` 7. **** ```js lastUpdated: true, themeConfig: { lastUpdatedText: "" } ``` 8. ** `title` ** ```js title: ' title', themeConfig: { logo: '/test.jpg', } ``` ![2023-05-30_093958](../images/vitepressNote/2023-05-30_093958.png) 9. **** ```js outDir: '../dist' ``` 10. **`markdown` ** ``` markdown: { //markdown theme: 'material-palenight',//md lineNumbers: true//md }, ``` 11. **`description` ** `` ```js description: ' description', ``` 12. **** `footer` ** `Sidebar` ** ``` themeConfig: { footer: { message: 'Released under the MIT License.', copyright: 'Copyright 2019-present Evan You' } } ``` 13. **** ```js outlineTitle: '' ``` 14. **`head`** ```js head:[ ['link', { rel: 'icon', href: '/favicon.ico' }] ] ``` ## 2GitHub ### 2.1 ****[10 - (juejin.cn)](https://juejin.cn/post/7064024606276845581) `Blog``github page` 1. **CNAME** - **CNAME** ipCNAME CNAME**CDN** - **** **** `CNAME` **** myblog.zhangjiancong.top myblog zhangjiancong.top @ **** ****CNAME . **TTL**600TTL **** ### 2.2 GitHub Pages ****[GitHub Pages - (zhihu.com)](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/183977963) ****[ GitHub Pages - GitHub ](https://docs.github.com/zh/pages/getting-started-with-github-pages/about-github-pages) GitHub Pages ************ GitHub GitHub - `.github.io` - `.github.io` - `http(s)://.github.io` `http(s)://.github.io` - `http(s)://.github.io/` `http(s)://.github.io/` GitHub 1. publishprivate 2. `Settings``Pages` 3. 4. `Custom domain`**** ### 2.3 vitepressGitHub 1. `deploy.sh` ```sh #!/usr/bin/env sh # # set -e # rm -rf docs/.vitepress/dist/ # yarn docs:build # cd docs/.vitepress/dist # # echo 'www.example.com' > CNAME git init git add -A git commit -m 'deploy' # https://.github.io # git push -f git@github.com:/.github.io.git main:master #mainmaster cd - ``` 2. **`config.js` `Repository name` `base` **CCS ```js export default defineConfig({ base: '/your-github-repository/' }) ``` 3. `package.json` `https://your-github.github.io/your-github-repository/` ```json json"scripts": { "deploy": "bash deploy.sh" } ``` [VuePress ](https://juejin.cn/post/7064746265266880549#heading-18) [VuePress ](https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fvuepress.vuejs.org%2Fzh%2Fguide%2Fdeploy.html) 3. `yarn docs:build ` 4. VScode`git bash here` ` bash deploy.sh` ****
